casebody.data: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Richard D. ACKERMAN. No. D-2938. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 31, 2016. Richard D. Ackerman, of Menifee, California, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
